thread.title: Super Mario Odyssey Announced for Nintendo Switch
thread.title_full: Super Mario Odyssey Announced for Nintendo Switch

author: Miranda Sanchez
title: Super Mario Odyssey Announced for Nintendo Switch
text:
Super Mario Odyssey is the next 3D Mario game to join the franchise's long list of games, and it's coming to the Nintendo Switch. 
Mario running around a city populated by people, an forest with huge trees, and possibly Bowser in a wedding suit. 
Gameplay for the new Super Mario was spotted in the first Switch trailer along with gameplay for Mario Kart 8 and Splatoon. 
Developing... 
Miranda Sanchez is an Editor at IGN. You can talk to her about video games, anime, and handsome robots on Twitter .
